stories.original_headline: A violent star explosion just revealed a hidden recipe for life
stories.original_summary: XRISMâ€™s high-precision X-ray data revealed unusually strong signatures of chlorine and potassium inside the Cassiopeia A supernova remnant. These levels are far higher than theoretical models predicted, showing that supernovae can be major sources of these life-critical elements. Researchers believe
stories.fantasy_headline: Cosmic Fire Reveals Hidden Ingredients for All Life
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Alchemists, using their enchanted gazing orbs, peered across the heavens. They discovered an exploding star, known as Cassiopeia's Veil, held an unexpected abundance of vital essences like shimmering salt and potent dusts. These findings far exceeded the wisdom of ancient scrolls, suggesting such celestial fury plays a crucial role in spreading the fundamental components of all living things throughout the realms.
